function.name: directions_between_2_locations_for_uganda_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "uganda_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint returns information about the route between two locations in terms of distance, duration, and steps.

Below Example: **Directions from a location in Nansana to Kampala**"

distance_unit.description: Unit of distance measurement, valid options are **km** (default), and **mi**.

function.name: reverse_geocode_for_uganda_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "uganda_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint allows you to perform reverse geocoding in Uganda by providing query parameters for latitude and longitude. It returns the name of the city where the location is located."

function.name: facilities_lookup_for_uganda_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "uganda_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint allows you to get facilities in Uganda like hospital, bank, college, etc. by providing optional query parameters for facility type, region and city. It returns a list of facilities that match the query parameters."

region.description: The region where the facility is located

type.description:
The type of amenity facility to search for (default: **hospital**)
Options:
**aerodrome, bar, cafe, fast_food, pub, restaurant, college, driving_school, school, university, bank, atm, pharmacy,** etc..        

[More options->](https://wiki.openstreetmap.o

limit.description: The number of facilities to query.

city.description: The city where the facility is located

function.name: geocode_for_uganda_api
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "uganda_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint allows you to lookup locations in Uganda by providing an address query parameter. It returns the latitude, longitude and city name of the location."

function.name: measure_distance_for_uganda_api
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "uganda_api", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This endpoint calculates the distance between two locations based on their latitude and longitude coordinates, while allowing the user to specify the unit of measurement.

Below Example: **Distance from Nansana to Kampala**"

unit.description: Unit of distance measurement, valid options are **km** (default), **mi**, **ft**, and **yd**.

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.

1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
